title: Lisa and the Devil & The house of Exorcism - Mario Bava / 2DVD
description:
Lisa and the Devil (Lisa e Il Diavolo) - Mario Bava 1972
House of Exorcism (La case dell Esorcismo - Mario Bava 1973) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0068863/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0068863/</a>

Amazing double DVD from Raro Video featuring both Lisa and the Devil (the original Italian version with removable English subtitles), and The House of Exorcism (the re-edited and partly re-shot English version)!

The great Mario Bava filmed the acclaimed Lisa and the Devil in 1972, but when the film was exported to America it was heavily changed in order to more comfortably fit in with the post-Exorcist craze for possession movies, resulting in the radically different The House of Exorcism. This incredible double DVD presents both versions of this ground-breaking film in their full uncut glory.

Picture: 16:9 Anamorphic WS
Sound/Subtitles: 2.0 Italian/English - English subs
Format: PAL
Extras:
# Documentary - L&#039;esorcismo di Lisa
# Trailer
# Photo gallery
# Mario Bava Biography and Filmography

Encoded with DVD-shrink. 
Lisa and the Devil is compressed from 4,9GB. House of Excorsism is untouched
